job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Government Administration,Information Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: <p><strong>We are looking to recruit a Software Engineer </strong></p><p><strong>The Role</strong></p><p>To review, analyze, and modify programming systems including encoding, testing, debugging, and installing application systems to support the needs of the Department.</p><p><strong>The Ideal Candidate</strong></p><ul><li>Will consult with users to identify current operating procedures and to clarify program objectives.</li><li>Must be familiar with a variety of the field's concepts, practices, and procedures, have extensive experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.</li><li>Will be required to perform tasks which include:</li></ul><p>Assisting with issues and remaining development related to the WebSphere Liberty 9 / Power BI Release</p><p>Assisting with Redesign the Provider Liability Account (PLA) interface and redesign the recovery of the Personal Support Worker (PSW) PLA.</p><p>Supporting the enhancement of the Provider page, PSW page and Electronic Visit Verification (EVV) to help track required training for PSWs</p><p>Facilitating the creation of capability for CMEs to upload claims for Rationed Fee for Service (RFFS) billing</p><p>Facilitating the transfer of the concepts and enhancements to existing team members to enable them to provide ongoing support</p><p>Providing consultation to senior leadership and helping with items in the Backlog to include Critical Priority Bugs and Enhancements</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Skill and Experience:</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Experience with eXPRS application</p><p>Expert-level knowledge and experience with WebSphere Liberty 9 and Java 11</p><p>Expert understanding of IBM DB2 UDB systems and concepts</p><p>Proficient with Eclipse IDE Liberty 9 Plug In, Git source control concepts</p><p>Excellent communication skills</p><p>Highly skilled Java developer</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualification:</strong> </p><p>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Information Technology or related field.</p><p>6+years of equivalent experience in the field or a related area.</p><p></p>
